parameters: <ActiveMessage: Hello!>
\n<Front Desk>Hello!
<ActiveMessage: Hello!>
\n<Front Desk>Hello, can you accept some commissions from the slum area?
\n<Front Desk> Completing tasks in the slum will make the slum's people accept you.
and allow you to enter the stores in the slums for trading...
\n<Front Desk> Hmm... but none of these commissions have been officially registered...
I guess it's because people still don't trust Mr. Sato yet...
\n<Front Desk> I'm afraid you'll have to find someone
in the slums with a request and confirm the situation yourself...
The front desk doesn't seem very motivated...
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Sato>Welcome to the slums.
Give me the intel you collected at the junkyard.
Showed Sato some of the intelligence gathered from the garbage station...
\n<Sato>\}Did all the unprocessed personnel get sent to the Tech Zone...?
This isn’t what I expected...\|
Sato muttered to himself...
\n<Sato>Alright, your information is valuable.
But it wasn’t what I expected to receive.
\n<Sato>According to the information I've obtained,
the junkyard should contain experimental data of a certain test subject.
Didn't you find any information like that there?\|
Inform him that advanced authentication is required
Inform him that advanced authentication is required
\n<Sato>Ah, so that’s why...
\}It seems that the things stored inside are even more important than I thought...?
\n<Sato>Sure, no problem. Just take my credentials with you.
That way, if some login records appear, I can explain it to my superiors.
To prevent you from getting into danger\|
\n<Sato>In that case, you'll have to go to the dump one more time.
It's already late today, let's head back to the safe zone and rest up for now.
\n<Sato>A little gift to celebrate our successful cooperation.\|
\n<Sato>From now on, the slums will also be open to you.
You can move freely in the slum area during your daily routine.\|
\n<Sato>But like I said, people here are ungovernable and xenophobic.
If you want to build a good relationship with them, you'll need to rely on yourself.
\n<\n[3]>Shall I head out first?
Today’s collaboration was quite pleasant, Miss \n[2].
\n<Sato>It's getting late, let's head back to the safe zone and rest for now.
\n<Sato>Before the next mission,
come find me here from the west side of the safe zone.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Sato>Mr.\N[1], you finally came.
\n<Sato> After thinking it over, I've decided to talk to you all
\n<Sato>This exploration mission is expected to be very dangerous,
After my investigation, we might encounter unstable zombie mutants\..\..\..
\n<Sato>And I currently can't provide you with adequate equipment and supplies,
So, you can refuse the mission.
\n<Sato> In that case, you can return to the safe zone and wait for developments...
Remember the date mentioned in the last document... there are still \v[27] days remaining.
What will happen when the time comes...?
Before that, it's better to find the truth...
If necessary, make sure to escape from here as soon as possible.
The trail from Yamashita's side has gone cold,
Currently, we can only accept Sato's tasks...
Maybe we can find a way out here.
Accept the mission
Accept the mission
\n<Sato> Oh, really? You are truly brave and righteous people,
On behalf of all the citizens, thank you!
\n<Sato> However, the danger of this mission might exceed your expectations.
You can prepare your equipment, and come find me when you're ready to fight.
\n<Sato>You can also take on tasks from the slums,
These guys might have some stashed supplies as rewards for you.
\n<Sato> By the way, \..\..\.. I heard from the locals here that
There is a mysterious peddler in the slum\|
\n<Sato> He will sell things that customers will need the most in the future.
Pretty creepy, right?
\n<Sato>If you're worried about what might happen on the next mission,
You can try to find this merchant\|
\n<\n[2]>\N[1], the same situation as last time with the antibiotics might occur...
We better find that merchant...\|
\n<\n[2]>Anyway, there's no harm in it.
A
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Sato> Are you ready to set out?
\n<Sato>This mission is extremely dangerous.
I suggest that you make full preparations.
Im ready
Hold on
Im ready

<
[3]>
[1], why are you here now?
\n<\n[3]>I've been looking for fun in the slums these past few days...
Looks like tagging along with you on missions isn't all bad.

<
[3]>Of course, the main reason is to protect 
[2]...\|
\n<\n[3]> For this, I swapped to a set of high-end gear...
\n<Sato>Let's head to the junkyard now.
\n<Sato> What I need is information on the mutant test subjects, please. \|
Phone.AddMessage("avabook", "Main Quest-11", 93)
\n<\n[3]>It's really hard to imagine a big company like Mikura Biotech.
Building a laboratory in here, huh?
\n<\n[2]>Even as an insider, I'm not aware of these situations...
\n<\n[2]>Even I, as an insider, am not aware of these situations...
I need to bring \N[2] to start the exploration mission...
Hold on
\n<Sato>\n[1], you have returned safely!
\n<\n[3]>What "returned safely"?
We didn't go on the mission expecting to battle monsters.
\n<Sato>How's the intel? Did you get it?
Questioning Sato
Give him infr
Questioning Sato
Questioned Sato about the actions of Mitsukura Bio...
Give him infr
\n<\n[2]>Don't forget about the Mikura Bio incident.
Questioned Sato about Mikura Bio's plans,
demanding he no longer hide the truth.
\n<Sato>emmm, it's different from what I told you in the safe zone.
\n<Sato>The fact that Mikura City hasn't been intervened
might not be because the outside world is merely observing.
That’s actually Sankura Biotech interfering.
\n<Sato> The current Mikura City is an ideal quarantine testing area.
Although the outbreak of the crisis was an accident,
the company decided to treat the crisis as an opportunity.
Conduct experiments on the characteristics of the virus right here\|
\n<Sato>Moreover, it's quite clear that this opportunity won't come again,
the crisis won't erupt again.
And such an ideal testing area is also difficult to reproduce\|
\n<Sato> The experimental data obtained from Mikura City can be used to produce a perfect biological weapon.
You've also witnessed that kind of super soldier.
\n<Sato> Perhaps not an invulnerable superman, but its cheap mass production cost and excellent capabilities
Enough to make Mikura Bio a monopolistic giant enterprise\|
\n<Sato>If everything goes according to the company's script...
After the experiment is completed, all that remains is to deal with the situation in Mikura City.
Just like disinfecting after completing an experiment on the lab bench...
What will happen then?
What will happen then?
\n<Sato> Sigh, even at this point, you still don't understand?
Although it hasn't been explicitly stated,
it's highly likely that they will neutralize the entire city.
\n<Sato>At that time, the unregulated virus and the traces of
the company's activities will be eradicated together.
Although it's a bit inhumane, it is indeed the most effective plan\|
Request for evacuation plan
Request for evacuation plan
\n<Sato> Hmm, now that you know the truth,
I also anticipated that you would make such a request.
\n<Sato> So I say, trust is the foundation of cooperation.
And your chance to evacuate will be the reward for our next collaboration\|
\n<Sato>Just as the intelligence you received indicated,
There are still \v[27] days until the end of the experiment.
The researchers have already gathered in the technology area.
\n<Sato> So, the critical experimental data is also in the safe zone.
What I need is this experimental data\|
Why not wait for companies to collect the data themselves?
Why not wait for companies to collect the data themselves?
\n<Sato> Heh, it's because the head of the safe zone is hiding something.
During this period, the data sent from the safe zone was far below expectations.
It must be them doing something sneaky\|
\n<Sato>Whether it's to sell the experimental data or for some other reason
It's definitely not a good decision to go against the company\|
\n<Sato> Yamashita and I were deployed to Mikura at the beginning of the crisis.
So, the headquarters already had measures in place to counter the defection from the laboratory here.
And now, we need to convict those guys and retrieve the data \|
\n<Sato>\..\..\..More importantly, all these actions must be completed before Yamashita.
How do we get into the tech zone?
How do we get into the tech zone?
\n<Sato> I've taken care of this,\n[2] Ma'am,
You were a senior staff member at Mikura Biotech before the crisis broke out, right?
\n<\n[2]>Huh? Yes, but I'm a marketing department employee...
I didn't know about these things before...
\n<\n[2]>Huh? Yes, but I'm a marketing department employee...
I wasn't aware of these things before...
\n<Sato>It doesn't really matter which position specifically,
During a critical crisis outburst, the company database was locked down.
And your information was already in the human resources database before this\|
\n<Sato> As long as I do this, I can use my company's connections.
Blend yourself in as an external inspector to enter the company.
\n<Sato>Although as parachuted supervisors, you may be suspected and targeted...
But we always have ways to solve it.
\n<Sato> A single exploration might not be enough to uncover all the information.
You'll probably need to visit the tech district two to three times\|
\n<Sato>During this time, I will also contact the outside,
Prepare your evacuation plan.
\n<Sato>When you are ready for this mission, come back here and find me.
\n<Sato> I will prepare a way for you to get to the Tech Zone by then.
And the contact information over there\|
Phone.AddMessage("avabook", "Main Quest-12", 94)
\n<Sato>You guys can go back and rest today.
\n<\n[3]>Today's battle was absolutely insane...
I must go home and vent a little\|
Remember to check your phone messages\|
em...
\n<\n[2]>Darling, let's go back too~
B
\n<Sato> I will prepare a method for you to go to the Tech District during this time.
And the contact information over there.
\n<Sato>Please be patient for the next few days.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Sato>\n[1], you're here.
\n<Sato>The connection on my side went smoothly,
so you can now head to the Technology Zone headquarters.
\n<Sato>Have you gathered any new intel during this time?
Check the safe zone and the slum area again—there always seems to be something off.
\n<Sato>I haven’t found any new information on my end,
but there are some leads over there that need confirming once you arrive.\|
\n<Sato>Are you ready to set off?
Yes
No
Yes
\n<Sato> Alright, no time to waste.
Wait until Inoshita arrives.
You should set off now.
NewClo
\n<\n[3]>This time, I guess the mission won't involve fighting and killing, right\|
\n<\n[3]>Hope you can make it a bit easier for me...
\n<\n[3]>\..\..I must say, the lady's work uniform looks really nice!
Hehe\|

\n<Sato> Being well-prepared is never a bad thing.
But also pay attention to the time.
\n<Sato>Your survival is also about this.

setBalloonLoop 2 0
Gave the information obtained from inside the company to Sato.
\n<Sato>\n[1], your work is done excellently
\n<Sato>We will focus on dealing with this intelligence for the next two days.
See if it meets the company's requirements\|
\n<Sato>Depending on the situation, we might need to assign you another mission.
How many more times will it take?
good
How many more times will it take?
\n<Sato>I promise, the next mission will be the last time we work together.
good
\n<Sato> I've already prepared your evacuation route.
Take a boat from the southern port of the Tech District \|
\n<Sato> And I guarantee that you'll leave Miura City before the deadline.
Explain the situation involving Yamashita
Explain the situation involving Yamashita
\n<Sato> Did Yamashita also go to the safe zone? And managed to contact Sato?
\n<Sato>...And also no reaction to \N[1] Mister's presence?
Sato lowered his head in thought for a moment.
\n<Sato> We're in trouble now.
I didn't expect Yamashita to gain speed by compromising.
\n<Sato>He probably wants to be the middleman,
Ask the researchers remaining in the city to negotiate peace with headquarters.
\n<Sato>Gave up interests and avoided conflict at the same time.
Do you want to just finish the work carelessly?
What a sore loser\|
\n<Sato>Don't worry, I will handle this personally.
Your mission remains unchanged, just wait for my contact.
\n<\n[3]>This mission format is quite interesting~
I will look forward to the next mission\|
\n<\n[2]>Inoshita... You really are something
\n<\n[3]>This mission format is quite interesting~
I'll look forward to our next mission\|
C
\n<Sato>Don't worry, I will handle the other matters personally.
\n<Sato>Your mission remains unchanged, just wait for my contact.
Remember the date mentioned in the last file... It's still \v[27] days from now\|
Try to train hard before contacting Sato...
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Sato>\n[1], you've arrived.
\n<Sato> Finally, this is our last mission.
\n<Sato> For the smooth execution of the mission and to fulfill our contract
This time, the mission will be carried out together by you and me.
\n<Sato> After today's mission is complete,
I will call the ferry to take us away from Mikura City together.
\n<Sato>First, let's go over the mission this time.
It's about retrieving the experimental data placed on Suzuki.
I have learned through intelligence that the guy always keeps the device storing the data close to him.\|
\n<Sato>And Yamashita and the other lab technicians over there,
it's just me and Miss [2] holding them off together.
\n<Sato>During this period, [1], you need to seize the data from Suzuki...
As for the means or whether Suzuki lives or dies, it doesn't matter.
The important thing is to acquire the data.\|
\n<Sato>Once you get the data,
we can only leave through the third warehouse.
Only our boat can pass through the level.
\n<Sato>For survival,
sacrificing the interests of others is sometimes unavoidable.
I hope you can make the right choice at the critical moment.
I got it
I got it
\n<Sato>I have always believed in you
Qualified Explorer\|
\n<Sato> All tasks have been prepared accordingly.
We must complete this mission within \v[27] days.
\n<Sato>I hope during the days I am not here
I am fully prepared.
\n<Sato>If you're ready to execute the mission, just let me know.
D

Yes

\n<\n[3]>Finally, it's the last mission.

However, there's no sign of any ships\|
\n<\n[3]>Madam, let's leave together when the time comes,
I can share some supplies with you.
